data.heading: Hi, I'm Sachin.
data.subheading: I help people build digital products with my design, development and marketing skills.

seo.title: Sachin Kr. Shukla
seo.description: I'm Sachin Kr. Shukla. I help people lift-off their digital products with my skills in project management, web & app dev and user experience and interface design.
